segments.text: Hi , Paulo . How are things going ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything's going very well . The first phase of the project was finished three days ahead of schedule . We're on target to complete phase two by the beginning of week 40 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good news . What stage are you at now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we've just finished laying the cabling and we're waiting for the safety inspector to give us the go-ahead to continue . I'm just going to meet him . Do you want to come ?
segments.speaker: S2
